name: One sculpture a day keeps the virus away

metadata.name: Popcorn time
metadata.description:
Title: Popcorn time.

From series « One sculpture a day keeps the virus away », 2020.

Artist name: Nicolas Haeni

Edition 1/1

Video mp4, 20 seconds, 1080 x 1920 px.

Initiated on March 17th 2020, during the two months of my lockdown in Switzerland, I diverted the objects of my daily life to metamorphose them into surprising sculptures. Every day, a new invention was presented in photos and videos using a simple smartphone. This activity stopped on May 11, the official date of the end of the first lockdown.
